content:
Getting a gym routine going can be tough, but having a convenient gym nearby can make all the difference. San Francisco has plenty of great gyms to choose from, and I'd be happy to recommend some options near your new apartment. However, to give you the most accurate suggestions, could you please tell me what neighborhood or area your apartment is in? That way, I can provide you with a list of gyms that are within walking distance or a short commute.

Also, are you looking for a specific type of gym or workout experience? For example:

* Traditional weightlifting and cardio equipment
* Group fitness classes (e.g., yoga, Pilates, spinning, boot camp)
* High-intensity interval training (HIIT)
* CrossFit or functional training
* Personal training or small group training
* Luxury gym with amenities like pool, sauna, or steam room
* Budget-friendly or affordable options

Let me know, and I'll do my best to recommend some great gyms near your new apartment that fit your needs and preferences!
